name: Threat of Wet
description:
Run, jump, dash, and battle your way through two massive levels and see how long you can survive. Grab new weapons and upgrades to rack up combos against monsters as you reach the end of each level. 

If you want to skip the tutorial, click on the tutorial button on the main menu to disable it.

This game was made by: Drew Bullinger, Gabriel Manners, Jackson Froelich, Mason Borenstein, Zane Weirbach, and Matthew Menezes.
